name: Drift Poison
description:
Drift Poison is a race, an arcade game whose roots begin with the times of 16-bit consoles. Remember that by avoiding collisions with substances, you are saving someone's life. At the end of the game, you can see the result: the number of points and the number of people saved. The machine has a margin of safety. When faced with different types of poison, 10 health points are taken away from the car. You need to score as many points as possible and save as many people as possible.

Control is carried out using the keys on the keyboard:

W - forward;

A - left;

D - right; 

Left mouse click - click on the button.
